Effect of Exchange Rate Changes: effect of exchange rate on cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents

Net Cash from Financing Activities: net cash provided by used in financing activities
Other Financing Activities: payments related to tax withholding for share based compensation
proceeds from payments for other financing activities
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from issuance of long term debt
proceeds from sale of available for sale securities debt
Proceeds from Stock Issuance: excess tax benefit from share based compensation operating activities
proceeds from issuance of common stock
Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock

Acquisitions (net of cash acquired): business combination consideration transferred equity interests issued and issuable
payments to acquire businesses net of cash acquired
fair value of equity awards assumed
Capital Expenditures: payments to acquire property plant and equipment
Net Cash from Investing Activities: net cash provided by used in investing activities
Other Investing Activities: payments for proceeds from other investing activities
Sales and Maturities of Investments: proceeds from maturities prepayments and calls of available for sale securities
proceeds from sale and maturity of marketable securities
proceeds from sale of available for sale securities

Net Change in Cash: cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in accounts payable and accrued liabilities
increase decrease in accrued taxes payable
increase decrease in contract with customer liability
increase decrease in operating capital abstract
increase decrease in prepaid deferred expense and other assets
Deferred Income Taxes: increase decrease in deferred income taxes
Net Cash from Operating Activities: net cash provided by used in operating activities
Other Non-Cash Items: other operating activities cash flow statement
Stock-Based Compensation: share based compensation arrangement by share based payment award equity instruments other than options share based liabilities paid
